abilities.description: (PASSIVE)SPIDER QUEENHuman Form:When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling.Spider Form:Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.
abilities.name: SPIDER QUEENH

abilities.description: (Q)NEUROTOXIN / VENOMOUS BITEHuman Form:Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.Spider Form:Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
abilities.name: NEUROTOXIN / VENOMOUS BITEH

abilities.description: (W)VOLATILE SPIDERLING / SKITTERING FRENZYHuman Form:Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.Spider Form:Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
abilities.name: VOLATILE SPIDERLING / SKITTERING FRENZYH

abilities.description: (E)COCOON / RAPPELHuman Form:Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.Spider Form:Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy. After descending on an enemy target, Elise's bonus damage and healing from Spider Queen is increased.
abilities.name: COCOON / RAPPELH

abilities.description: (R)SPIDER FORMTransforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for Move Speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
abilities.name: SPIDER FORMT
